amendment.description: To require the Departments, agencies, and commissions to establish and maintain on their website homepages a direct link to the websites of their Inspectors General, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3247 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3247 proposed by Senator Mikulski for Senator McCaskill. (consideration: CR S12844-12845; text: CR S12845) To require the Departments, agencies, and commissions to establish and maintain on their website homepages a direct link to the websites of their Inspectors General, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3247 proposed by Senator Mikulski for Senator McCaskill.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3247 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
